alert.note: Alert for Charlotte; Halifax (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 4:30AM EST until January 11 at 8:56AM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Portions of central and south central Virginia, including the following counties, in central Virginia, Appomattox and Buckingham. In south central Virginia, Charlotte and Halifax. * WHEN...Until 700 AM EST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 428 AM EST, gauge reports indicated several creeks and small rivers exceeding flood stage. Between 2 and 3 inches of rain had fallen earlier. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Buckingham, South Boston, Halifax, Keysville, Charlotte Court House, Dillwyn and Phenix. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
